definitions.text: a speech that is open to the public
examples: he attended a lecture on telecommunications
a good lecture was my father's idea of discipline
the teacher gave him a talking to

definitions.text: teaching by giving a discourse on some subject (typically to a class)

examples: She will talk at Rutgers next week
Did you ever lecture at Harvard?
The mother scolded the child for entering a stranger's car
The deputy ragged the Prime Minister
The customer dressed down the waiter for bringing cold soup
